title: Monday Post Show (08-30-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (08-30-21)
description:
We start by sharing our Headlines from the Weekend. Amy shares that her bird feeders went back up! Bobby played Pickle Ball with his wife and another couple. Eddie got to bring his foster son to the Opry to see The Raging Idiots perform. Eddie also talks about when Bobby gave his son $20 bucks at the Opry and it caused issues at home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
